languages.text: Вашу судьбу вытесали в камне. Тому, кто живет в настоящем, незачем страшиться будущего. Но, рано или поздно, будущее настигает каждого.
Your very life's path has been carved into stone. One who lives in the present has no reason to fear the future. But sooner or later, the future catches up with everyone.
languages.original_text: Вашу судьбу вытесали в камне. Тому, кто живет в настоящем, незачем страшиться будущего. Но, рано или поздно, будущее настигает каждого.

traits.locale_text: Your life's path has been carved into stone. One who lives in the present has no reason to fear the future. But sooner or later, the future catches up to everyone.

Your very life's path has been carved into stone. One who lives in the present has no reason to fear the future. But sooner or later, the future catches up with everyone.

languages.text: あなたの人生の道筋は、すでに石に刻まれている。今を生きる者に、未来を恐れる理由はない。だが遅かれ早かれ、未来はすべての者に追いついてくる。
languages.original_text: Your very life's path has been carved into stone. One who lives in the present has no reason to fear the future. But sooner or later, the future catches up with everyone.

traits.locale_text: あなたの人生の道筋は、すでに石に刻まれている。今を生きる者に、未来を恐れる理由はない。だが遅かれ早かれ、未来はすべての者に追いついてくる。

languages.text: Yaşamında izleyeceğin yol, taşa işlenmiş. Anı yaşıyor ve yarının getireceklerinden korkmuyorsun. Fakat gelecek, er ya da geç herkesin kapısını çalar.
languages.original_text: Your very life's path has been carved into stone. One who lives in the present has no reason to fear the future. But sooner or later, the future catches up with everyone.

traits.locale_text: Yaşamında izleyeceğin yol bir taşa işlenmiş. Anı yaşıyor ve yarının getireceklerinden korkmuyorsun. Fakat er ya da geç, gelecek herkesin kapısını çalar.

languages.text: La senda de tu vida está grabada en piedra. Quien vive en el presente no tiene motivos para temer el futuro, pero, tarde o temprano, el futuro nos llega a todos.
languages.original_text: Your very life's path has been carved into stone. One who lives in the present has no reason to fear the future. But sooner or later, the future catches up with everyone.

traits.locale_text: La senda de tu vida está grabada en piedra. Quien vive en el presente no tiene motivos para temer el futuro, pero, tarde o temprano, el futuro nos llega a todos.

languages.text: 你的人生轨迹已经被刻在了石头上。活在当下的人没有理由惧怕未来，但终有一天，未来的景象会展现在每个人眼前。
languages.original_text: Your very life's path has been carved into stone. One who lives in the present has no reason to fear the future. But sooner or later, the future catches up with everyone.

traits.locale_text: 你的人生轨迹已经被刻在了石头上。活在当下的人没有理由惧怕未来，但终有一天，未来的景象会展现在每个人眼前。

languages.text: Votre destin a été gravé dans la pierre. Qui vit dans le présent n'a aucune raison de craindre l'avenir, mais tôt ou tard, le futur finit toujours par nous rattraper.
languages.original_text: Your very life's path has been carved into stone. One who lives in the present has no reason to fear the future. But sooner or later, the future catches up with everyone.

traits.locale_text: Votre destin a été gravé dans la pierre. Qui vit dans le présent n'a aucune raison de craindre l'avenir, mais tôt ou tard, le futur finit toujours par nous rattraper.

languages.text: Dein Lebensweg wurde in Stein gemeißelt. Nur wer in der Gegenwart lebt, muss die Zukunft nicht fürchten. Aber früher oder später holt die Zukunft jeden ein.
languages.original_text: Your very life's path has been carved into stone. One who lives in the present has no reason to fear the future. But sooner or later, the future catches up with everyone.

traits.locale_text: Dein Lebensweg wurde in Stein gemeißelt. Nur wer in der Gegenwart lebt, muss die Zukunft nicht fürchten. Aber früher oder später holt die Zukunft jeden ein.
